name: Soundboard Sampler
description:
A sampler of some of Anna Cooley's sound design and audio implementation work, rolled into a cheeckey and easy to use soundboard.

Instructions:

- Click a sound to activate it

- If the sound loops, it will loop until you stop hovering your cursor over the button

- Many buttons play a multiple sound effects so be sure to press each one a couple of times

- Have fun and thanks for interacting! :)
